data.name: OverrideMissionCharacterWeapon
data.value: Override mission character's weapons. Works independently of 'MissionCharacterBehaviour' settings.

data.name: MissionCharacterBehaviour
data.value: Whether it affects mission-related characters. -AffectAllCharacter: Include all mission-related characters. -ExcludeUniqueCharacter: Exclude named characters and important mission characters. -ExcludeAllMissionCharacter: Exclude all mission-related characters.

data.name: AttackPlayerCorrection
data.value: Adjust the player's targetability. If OFF, the player will be targeted depending on the position relationship with the ped.

data.name: StupidShootingRate
data.value: Probability of peds firing a gun without regard to whether the line of fire is through or not.

data.name: ForceExplosiveWeaponProbability
data.value: Probability of explosive weapons being forcibly selected.

data.name: Description
data.value: Pedestrians near the player become armed and attacking.
